home.title: You Have the Vision. I Build the Digital Reality.
home.description_p1: I'm a technical partner for artists, photographers, and artisans who are ready to elevate their online presence.
home.description_p2: You create stunning work. I build the world-class website that showcases it, turning your passion into a thriving online business.

services1.title: Solutions for Creative Professionals
services1.description: Your craft deserves a beautiful, high-performance website. Discover the packages designed to help your creative business succeed.
services1.web_dev_desc: A stunning portfolio to showcase your work and attract high-value clients.
services1.maintenance_desc: A beautiful online store to sell your products, prints, or digital goods.
services1.optimization_desc: Ongoing support to keep your site secure, updated, and running smoothly.
services1.consultation_desc: Expert guidance to map out your digital strategy and achieve your goals.

testimonials.title: What My Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: I'm proud to partner with creatives to build a digital presence they love.

list.quote: Miss Bott translated our artistic vision into a website that was more beautiful and functional than we ever imagined. The entire process was seamless.
list.name: OpenEire Studios

list.quote: Working with Miss Bott was a game-changer. Our new portfolio site has already led to two major commissions. Truly a professional and intuitive partner.
list.name: CMD Artistry

services2.cta_title: Ready to Elevate Your Online Presence?
